comment._content: HMS ROYALIST 'dressed' for some occasion. The ship is a popular subject on Flickr. My favourite is the crew (c.1895) - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3575338132/] from.ph/385878 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3640341634/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3506211161/] Not forgetting in Brisbane - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/whatsthatpicture/3731238863/]

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: More info about HMS ROYALIST - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMS_Royalist_(1883) In October 1897 (the date of the returning Jubilee Contingent) the ROYALIST had returned to Sydney for the first time in eight months - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/9407523 .
